H0.text: what is the name of the capital of belgium. Brussels

H1.text: what is the name of the capital of belgium. Antwerp

H2.text: what is the name of the capital of belgium. Bruges

H3.text: what is the name of the capital of belgium. City of Brussels

A4.text: The City of Brussels, which is the capital of Belgium.

A5.text: Article 194 of the Belgian Constitution establishes that the capital of Belgium is the City of Brussels.
